content.content: not only 1 or 2 people who asked about the next airdrop rounde… is it true that there will be more airdrops in the future like last year… please explain so you don’t ask too many questions

I’ve been seen discussion on this airdrop stuff and I’m also wondering if it’s official or just a request from a member. Many missed that of last year including myself because the conditions was not met. If I remember correctly, a previous transaction on uniswap before the airdrop announcement was a criteria. Many of us were just trying to understand Uniswap then. I wish the airdrop is repeated this year.
